Name: Fog
Description: Lowers enemy accuracy. Deals trifling damage over time.

Name: Frost
Description: Weak single hit attack that substantially reduces enemy speed.

Name: Ice Armor
Description: Gives Jethro armor reducing damage by 3/4 for 2 turns.

Name: Ice Barrier
Description: Reduces damage to team by half for 2 turns.

Name: Unbreakable
Description: Cannot be killed by a critical hit, leaving him with 1 hp.

Name: Ice Spear
Description: Powerful single hit with a high critical chance.

Name: Frost Bite
Description: A primal magic attack of Crestian heritage. Strike your opponent with an intense ice attack that has a 60% chance of leaving your opponent petrified.

Name: Diamond Peak
Description: Conjure a rending pillar of ice, which deals heavy damage and inflicts bleeding on all opponents.
